transArray.content: The room is clean and hygienic, the layout and facilities are very reasonable, the wet and dry separation of the bathroom is very convenient, and the decoration is also very innovative! The surrounding area is also very convenient! Very satisfied with the in-store service and very good service! !
Hello, dear guest, thank you for your choice. Xiaohan will continue to maintain it. If you are blown into Xiaohanâ€™s arms by the strong wind, Xiaohan will not return it. I love you Hanting.
